description: Sign in with GitHub - Ideal for developer tools and technical audiences

steps: Go to GitHub Settings > Developer settings > OAuth Apps
Click 'New OAuth App' or 'Register a new application'
Copy Client ID and Client Secret

replaceInRedirectUris.YOUR-PROJECT-REF: Replace with your Supabase project reference ID

envVars.GITHUB_CLIENT_ID: The OAuth App Client ID from GitHub
envVars.GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET: The OAuth App Client Secret from GitHub

scopes.description: Default scopes provide user email and basic profile. Add repo scopes for code-related AI tools.

accessProviderToken.description: Access GitHub API on behalf of the user

commonIssues.solution: User must have a public email or grant user:email scope. Check user.email in response.
Use OAuth App for simple auth. GitHub App for advanced features (webhooks, fine-grained permissions).
Authenticated requests have higher rate limits. Cache user data to reduce API calls.

githubApp.description: For advanced integration, use GitHub App instead of OAuth App
